scripts.start:apiserver: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev LOGS_LEVEL=verbose nodemon --watch mods/apiserver mods/apiserver/src/index.ts
scripts.start:voice: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev LOGS_LEVEL=verbose nodemon --watch mods/voice --exec ts-node mods/voice/src/demo.ts
scripts.start:autopilot: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev LOGS_LEVEL=verbose nodemon --watch mods/autopilot --exec ts-node mods/autopilot/src/runner.ts mods/autopilot/assistant.json
scripts.start:services: cross-env docker compose -f compose.yaml -f compose.dev.yaml up routr nats envoy influxdb postgres adminer mailhog rtpengine asterisk simplephone -d --remove-orphans
scripts.start:audiosocket: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev LOGS_LEVEL=verbose nodemon --watch mods/streams --exec ts-node mods/streams/src/example.ts
scripts.start:micVad: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev LOGS_LEVEL=verbose nodemon --watch mods/autopilot/src/vad --exec ts-node mods/autopilot/src/vad/micVadTest.ts
scripts.stop:services: cross-env docker compose -f compose.yaml -f compose.dev.yaml down
scripts.clean: rimraf mods/**/dist mods/**/node_modules mods/**/package-lock.json node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.db:migrate: npx prisma migrate dev --schema ./mods/apiserver/schema.prisma --name init --preview-feature && npx prisma migrate dev --schema ./mods/identity/schema.prisma --name init --preview-feature
scripts.generate:prisma-clients: npx prisma generate --schema ./mods/apiserver/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema ./mods/identity/schema.prisma
scripts.test: cross-env LOGS_LEVEL=none NODE_ENV=dev mocha --require ts-node/register mods/**/*.test.ts
scripts.integration: cross-env LOGS_LEVEL=none NODE_ENV=dev mocha --slow 50000 --timeout 10000 --require ts-node/register mods/**/node.integration.ts && web-test-runner
